name: Devil's Altar
description:
After getting shipwrecked on a randomly generated island, you make a deal with the devil to escape. Defend his shrine for 5 nights, and he'll help you off!

In the day, you'll need to gather resources. At dusk, build your tower defence. And at night, pray that your defence holds!

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Move camera - Right Click

Gather resources - Left Click

Place Wall/ Turret - Left Click
